sam/ bya@#// ji snyam du sems/ de ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya zhe na/ shAri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de tshe'i tshad da bag tu med de/ de'i 'ur
de bzhin gshegs pa tshedapag med ces bya'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med ces bya zhen/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i
rgyu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du thogs pa med de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag medatses bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bskal pa banu lon no// shAri'i bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dag pa dgra bam pa
sha stag tshadamed de/ de dag patshad brjod par sla ba ma yin no// shAri'i bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i solasan dgan pa'i mi ldog pa/ skyo ba gtsagags thogs ba'i
byang chub sems dpa' dag pa sha stag go/ shAri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis tshad ni brjod par sla ba ma yin te/ gzhan du na tshadamad grangs mod pa'i gradusu 'gro'o// de'i
bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu dag gis legs bar brgyan pa'o// shA ri'i bu de ltabs na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos sangs/

rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir nga ga ba'i rtsa ba rnams gus par khongs su bsngo bar bya'o// dpa'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag dang phrad bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
shAri'i bu dag ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon tsam gyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag mad de'i zhing du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs bu mo
gang gas dzacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i mtshan thos la/ thos nas kyang yid la byed tsang nub gcig gam/ nub gatres sam/ nub gsum mam/ nub
bzhi 'a ma/ nub lnga 'am/ nub drug gam/ nub bdun du g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis yid la byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshi/ phyin
ci log med pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ 'chi ba'i dus byas ba de de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing/ byang chub/
sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bdun gyis bltas pa'i bdun na bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi nang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
can du skye bar 'gyur ro// shAri'i bu de lta bas na don gyi dbang de mthong nas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigasakyi bu mos sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gus par smon lam gdab par phya pa'i
mtha da/ zhes de skad bshad do// shA ri'i bu ji ltar de bzhin gshepa des da ltar longs su brjod pa bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu la phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhani gshegs/
ba mi 'khrugs ba zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhan gshegs pa lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhun bonan po/
zla zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhun bor snang ba zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshags pa 'jam sgra zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs zhes bya ba dang/ de dag
la sogs bshar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams lcags kyi dpang pos khebs par mdzad do// khyed cag
lon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches par gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad do//
de bzhin du lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i sgron ma zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba
dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba 'od 'phro'i phung bo zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i sgron ma zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' las
tha01/zhes bya ba dang/ de dag la sogs pa lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams lcags kyi dbang pos khebs par
mdzad de/ khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis ma khyab pa longs su brjod pa/ sangs rgyas thams tsang kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grongs 'di la yid ches par gyis
shigaces gsungs pa mdzad de// de bzhin du nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med ces bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa bung po dbag med ces bya ba dang/ de
bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan dpag med ces bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa ni po che'i tog ces bya ba dang/ de bzhan gshegs pa 'od zer dug nga zhes bya bdung/ de dag la sogs pa nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasagang+gA'i
krung ga bye ma skad dug rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams lcags kyi dbang pos khebs par mdzad de/ khyedapag yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa// sangs
rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi rnamagrangs 'dil yade ches par gyis shig ces gsung pa mdzad do// de bzhin du byang phyogasan/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro'i phung bo man ngo/
dbal dang/ de bzhin gshegal bcan gyi 'od ces bya ba rgyas kyi 'di rnams lcags bar gyis gtses bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegany+tsas bcom ldan 'das ga
wa nang@#/ khya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sgrol ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu thul dka' zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs/
pa ni ma 'byung zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba dang/ de dag la sogs pa byung khog
kyisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasagang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams lcags kyi dbang bas khebs par mdzad de/ khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa
yongs su brjod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches bar gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad do// de padan du 'og gi phyogs na de
la bzhin gshegs pa seng ge zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhinagshegs pa grags pa zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa 'od ces bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos zhes bya ba dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'dzin ces bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba dang/ de dag la sogs pa 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i
06 su bzungaba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la med rnyes par gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad do// de bzhin du stong gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gsheg pa spos mchog ces bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos 'od ces bya ba dang/ de bzhun gshags pa
spos kyi phung po zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog shin tu rgyas pa'i rigs zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang
de ban gshegs pa rin chen ut+pa la'i dpal zhes bya pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba den yod ces bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba dang/ de
dag la sogs pastang gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhang rnams ljags kyi dbang pos khebs par mdzad de/ khyed
cag yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid sa bar gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad do// shArin
yu 'di jisnyam du sems/ tsa' bya chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba zhes bya zhen/ shA'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs
'di dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan thos par gyur ba dang/ thos ba dang/ thos bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan
[@ ]'das rnams kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ shAri'ibu sogs nagang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bad pa
can du sems kyis smon bar byed pa 'am byas pa 'am/ byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/ yi ga log go/
sgyu phyir mi ldog par 'gyur go/A li'i bu ji ltar nga da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa de bzhin du/ shA ri'i busangs rgyas bcom lda/
'das de dag kyang nga' yon tan bsam gyis ma khyab pa yongs su brjod do// shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal pos bskal pa'i snyigs ma dang/
nyon mongs pa'i snyags ma dang sems can gyi snyigs ma dang// lta ba'i snyigs ma dang/ tshe'i snyigs ma'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i chos kha stan bani ngomatshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sha yi'i
bu snyigs ma lnga'i tshe/'jig rten du 'jig rtenagyi khams mi mjed du thun med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyas te/ 'dzin rten thams cad dang mi mthun
pa'i chos bstan pa de ni mchog tu dka' ba byed pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalanas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ han gos chen po de dgadang/
byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yarangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phag
pa bde bcan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la la sogs pa dang/ zhu tshanagyi le ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sog
pas bsgyur cing gtan la bab pa// ka// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rab+hu pA la pa ri prats+tshanan ma mahA yA na sU tra bod skad du 'phags pa
tshul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thums cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gsathos pa dus gabi/
bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu 'a dag slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas tshedang
ldan pa yul 'khor skyong stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsug te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tsom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
bstan pa 'di nub par bgyid pa'i sems can gang lags ba de dag ji lta bu dag cig lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul
'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshul 'khor skyong gnas 'di gnyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ dag skyong gi gnas dang/ lhod
pa'i gnas so// de la dag slong gi gnas ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i phyogs khang yin pa'o lhod pa'i gnas na tshul khrims 'dul pa'i phyogs gang lan pa'o// yul 'khor skyong de la
yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa'i dag slong gisani gnas 'di gnyis la bslab par bya'o/ gnyis gang zhin/ tshul khrims kyi phung bos kyang shin tu bsrung bar bya ba dang/
bdag nyid la nges par bsam par bya'i phyishel la nges par bsam par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar bdag la nges par bsam bag bya'i/ ba rtsol la nges par bsam par mi bya zhen/
sa / des 'di ltar brtag par bya sta/ ci bdag rang gi sdug bsngal gyi phung pozad bar byed 'dod ba lananam/ 'on te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa
'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa yin snyam du brtag par bya'o// gal te nyan thos kyi theg pas longs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa zhig yin na ni/ des nyan thos kyi bslab pa kho na la bsu'i
par bya ste/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdam par bya'o// cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs par bya'o// len ma bye ba phra rab tsam dgala'ang 'jag par lta bas yang dag par
blangs te bslab par bya'o// bslab pa'igazhi rnams la'ang lus kyi las dang/ ngag gi las dang/ yid kyi las yongs su dag par bya'o/ 'do ba yongs su dag pa dang/ smad du med par yang
bya 'o brkam pa med cing ro rnams la 'chums pa med pa dang/ chos gos la snod brin par yang bya'o// lhung bzed la tshod zin par yang bya'o// des kha zas log drad kyis bsgra' bar/
yang mi bya ste/ lto ma bkres pa tsam du khan bras bsrung bar des bslab par bya'o// des kha bras la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mi gtsang ba'i 'dushes bskyed par bya sta/'dalta ste/ phyis dang//
gzhigyi 'dushes dang/ rnag gi 'du shes dang/ skyogs pa'i 'du shes dang/ mi gtsang ba'i 'dushes dang/ rma bsku nga lta bu'i 'du shes dang/ smad pa'i 'du shes dang/ mi mthun
'khas/ @#// pa'i 'dushes dang/ bu'i sha lta bu'i 'du shes dang/ der ba'i 'du shes dang/ spang ba'i 'du shes dang/ dri mi zhim pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ des de lta
bu'i tshul du bza' zhing tshod ga sa bya'o// des chags bden pa dang/ snang ba med pa dad rmongs pa mud pa dang/ rtag tu dben pa la mno bar dga' bar bya ste/ bre mo'i gtam
ts+tshil mngon par dga' bar mi bya'o// ri dgas 'chi ba lta bur dang du blang bar bya'ogo/ dben par bya'o/ dben bal man par dga' bar bya'o/ dben ba la mngon par dga' zhing mos
pa dang/ bzod pa dang ldan par bya'o// des pa dang 'grogasan bde bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi gtam la mi bstan par bya'o/ 'o tshong spyod pa spang bar bya'o// sman dpyad la
dga' ba dang/ 'phrinapa la dga' gdang/ khyim gyi bya ba dang 'brel bar mi bya'o// 'dug pa dang/ 'gros ba dang 'jug pa dang/ ldul ba la mkhas pa bya'o// rab tu dben pa
dang/ dgon par dga' ba dang/ zhi ba'i gnas la sgra nang ba/ skad chung ba dang/ 'jig ba'i yid la byed pa med pa/ sdig sprul med pa dang/ mi mang bo med pa/ mis dben
ba/ nang du yang dag 'jog dang 'tsham pa bstan par bya'o/ bdagabastod par yang ma bya/ gzhan smad par yang mi bya'o// tshul 'chos pa dang// kha gsag mi bya'o// rtag tu
sa rgyun mi 'chad bar skyo ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// des khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba rnams dang 'du zhang 'dris par mi bya'o// stong pa'i chos rnams kun tu bsten par bya//
bsgom par bya/ mang du bya'o// des rags ba dang mi ldan pa'i dge slong dang lhan tsag phrad par spang bar bya'o// dge slong ma dang 'dris bar mi bya'o// 'dod pa chung bar yang bya'o//
rtag tu bdag nyid kyi 'khrul pa rnams la so sor brtag par bya'o// gzhan gyi 'khrul pa rnams la brtag par mi bya'o// pha ma la'ang yid brtan par mi byan/ rigs gzhan lta las smos
shin tu yang dag par bsnyon pa can du bya'o// nye bar zhi ba'i chos kyi sbyin bdag bya'o dmigs pa la ma bas par bya'o// dben pa'i gnas mal du gnas bar bya'o// mthun pa dang
gzhan dag la smra par mi bya na/ mi mthun pa lta smos/ des chos de dag la sems nye bar gnas par byas nas/ chos zab mo rnams la so sor brtag par byako chos zab mo
rnams la nga rtag par bya ba de dag kyang gang zhe na/ mig mi rtag gosnyam du so sor brtag par bya'o// de'i skye ba dang 'jig pa la'ang so sor brtag par bya'o// de la skyo ba dang gas pa
la so sor brtag par gang yin pa de ni med pa la so sor brtag pa'o// de'i phyir zhe na/ mig ces bya ba na med pa'i phyir ro// mag dang/ gzugs dang/ mig gi rnam par shes/
'a bya// ban dmigs pa ma yin gyi/ med pa dmigs ba yin no// de ci'i phya'i zhen/ chos thams cad ni dmags pa med pa'i phyir ro// dres rna ba'i rten bsam par
mi bya'o// sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi rten bsam par mi bya'o// ci'ang rung ba'i rten bsam par mi bya'o// de ltar byas na zhag bsam pa yin/ de bzhin du chos rnams stong par
yang brtson par bya'o// de ltar brtson pa de ni tshul khrims kyi phung po longs su dag par bya da do// ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang/ shes rab kyi phung po yongs su dag bar byed do// rgyun du
zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// lan tsag phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i 'du 'o dzamad
pa na dang po'i nyan thos kyi sa lan te/ de dag gis zag pa zad pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de la dge sbyong ltar bcos pa gang zhe na/ lul 'khor skyong 'di ni dag sbyong bdag nyid la nga'o
snyam du 'dzin te/ de ni tshul khrims kyi phung po longs su ma rdzogs pa dang ldan pa yin/ chos gos gces par 'dzin pa yin/ lhung bzed gces par 'dzin ba yin/ zang brang
gces par 'dzan pa yin taM/ de nami smra ba spangs nas/ ngan song du 'gyur ba'i mal cha dang stan dang/ mgron du gnyer ba chen po rnams bdag ga'i byed/ bud med dang 'dris
par byed/ dge slong ma dang 'dris par byed/ rgyal pos bkrabs pa dang 'dres par byed/ de 'dris par gyur nas rgyun mi 'chad par mig gi gzugs rnams la nges par soms so//
des de ltar sems bskyod nas kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ro// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sabs dang ldan n gnas 'di lta bu yod do// zhes pa la ni bad byed pa 'an/ mang
na chung ngu byed cing 'dug par 'gyur te/ yul 'khor skyong 'di ni dag sbyong ltar bcos pa yin no// yul 'khor skyong ba'i phyir dag sbyong ltar bcos pa zhes bya zhen/ dag sbyong ltar
btsos pa de de bzhin gshegs pas mal cha dang/ stan gnang ba tha mal pa gang la dag sbyong ba gnas mal cha dang/ stan gang yin pa ma blun po des spangs nas chos gos la zhen
tsang zang zang la zhen nas bud med dang 'dris par byed par/ khyim pa dang 'dras par bye dan/ 'dris par gyur ba'i ma blun po de la dag sbyong gi tshul lta ga la yod de/ de'i stang du
rtos brab mo rnams la'ang sun 'byin cange gshe bar byed la/ des khros suwin kyang bsngags pa ma yin pa rjod par byed do/ dgon pa'i bsngags pa ma pa ni brjod par yang byed de/
gang la de'i soms mngon par dga' ba'i 'dod pa rnams 'ba' zhag ga bsngags pa rjod bang byed tsang/ gang la de'i sams man par dga' ba'i bre mo gtam 'ba' zhagagi bsngaglu
bya@#// pa rjod par byed l/ dge slong gi gnas gang yang rung ba de dag gi bsngags bam yin ba rjod par byed do// gang las de bzhin gshegs pas mdo'i tshig bae
yin gnas pa dang/ rab tu byung ba rnams dang 'du 'dzi mi 'gyur bar bya'o zhes gsungs ba'i mdo'i tshig de bod nas/ dge sbyong gi tshul mi 'dod cing/ dge sbyong gi dngos po ni
'dod tsang/ gtsag bu 'dug cing bud med la chos 'chad par byed la/ gzhan dag la'ang de lta bu'i gzhi rnams su lung 'bog par byed do// de ci'i phyi'i 'on/ de dag ni di
bzhan gshegs pas chos kyi chom rkun por gsungs te/ so sor thar pa spangs pa nas/ gcig tu 'dug mang bud med la chos 'chad pa'i phyir ro// ma blun po de dag ni bcos ma sta/
mgo bregs pas bcos pa drang/ gos ngur smig gyon pas bcos pa'o// rgyu gang gis bcos pa yin par shes par bya zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis smad pa
gang yin pa de de mi blon pod dug gis gnang bar byed do/ le'u shu ma lon par rdzogs pa'i snyan par byed/rang galag gis len par byed/ ma brtags pa longs spyod bar byed/ nga 'ad
galos dang 'dod pa'i las byed/ gsar dang dngul bdag gir byed/ khre rgod dang 'bru sogs par byed/ khyim gyi gzhi dang/ nang gi gzhi dang/ kun dga' rnga ba'i gna'i tshong byed ng/ tshal ba'i
'tsho ba sbyor bar byed/ khyim gyi gzhi dang/ zhing gi gzhi dang/ kun dga' ra ba'i gzhi len par byed da/ las kyi rnam par smin ba la'ang yid mi ches shing/ so sor thar pal mdad nas/
de la gzhol/ de la 'bab/ de la bab de dben par 'dzin// der spyod lam byed/ dge sbyong du 'du bar 'dzin cing// gang na skye bo mang po yod pa der gcer bu ba dang mtshungs par ston bar/
byad/ gong zag tu lta ba bsngags par byed/ gang khrag lta bdang/ gcer bu pa dang mtshungs par ston pas skyabo mang po 'dzud par byed cade 'god par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul dang/
gshegs pa'i gnas pa stong pa nyid la dmigs nas sun 'byin par byed 1 gshe bar byed par shes par bya'o// yul 'khor skyong de lta bu'i sems can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag
na khyim pa'i ng ma yin/ dge sbyong yang ma yin te/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan bad nub par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rtsa tshugs su bas ba/
'di dag bka' stsal te// dag spong tshul khrims rnams la gdams// ne zhing na ba'i gnas la dga'// so sor thad la slob byed pa// de dag dge slong bram ze yin// chos rnams
gtso bo blangs nas ni// ci yang med pa'i dge slong ba// pas mtha' dgon pa rnamasu dga'/ dedag dge slong bram ze yin// de dag bra mo gtam mi dga'// so sor thar rnams las
ba/ 4// bar bslabs// gang zag mchog la nyin mtshan du/ bkur sti chen po byed ba yin// nang yang mi rmad tshong ma byed// ltung ba zad chos gos red mi tshol// len bshad/
gyi bar brtson pa gang// de dag sangs rgyas zhwan gros yani// de dag bud mad ston mi byed// bud med rnams dang 'du ba med// shang drung rnams ni bsngags par byed// de dag sangs rgyas
'an zlos yin// zas dang skom dang don gyi phyir// gnams gang dag yong ma byed// de 'drar gyur pa de dag na// dge slong ma la ston mi byed// mtshon rnon dza ltar brdar ba bzhin//
bud med rnams ni de 'drar shes// so sor thar las 'byung ba bzhin/ bud med 'du shes spong bar byed// des pa de dag zas byare dang// skom gyi phyi'i dang gos kyi phyir// khyami
khyim dag tu 'gro byed cing// chos rnams ston par mi byed do// dag slong rnams kyis bud me da rnams// blta bar mi bya rdzogs sangs gsungs// de la shes ldan su zhag rton//
da ni bdud kyi spyod yul yin// de dag gsan mad pa smra// ro dang nyal ba bzhin du nyal// de phyir sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen// 'du 'dzi bsngags par mi mdzad do// mosanas
srog med gso ba med// gsob dang gsog dang snying po mad// stong pa nyid la chos byed pa// de ni dge slong chos nyid do// rtag tu brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs// gcig pudagon
pa gnas byed dang// 'jig rtenanani rten med sams// de ni dge slong chos nyid do// sang ge bzhin du 'jigs pa med// tshangs bar spyod pa gzhol bar byed// sdug bsngal kun
las thar bya'i phyir// shes rab ldan pas lam la sgom// mgo dang gzugs ni tshol na// de dag gsan rnam shes rnyed// dngos po de yang tshol ba na// btsalaM ba gang yin ma
rnyed de/ sngon yang ma byung phyis mi 'byung// dbus na'ang yod pa ma yin te// de lta bu yi don gyis na/ ngos kun mnyam pa nyid kyi phul// des pa de dag zas phyi'i dang// skom gyi
phyir dang gos kyi phyir// khyam khyim dog tu 'gro byed cing// chos rnams ston par mi byed do// rgyu mad das pa bzung bo yin// de dag sangs rgyas bslab pa rnams// 'dul nang
'jigs par mi byed de// brtul babrang stong nyid skrag pa med// 'jigs pa med par 'jug pa byed/ lta ba ma bzad 'jig mi byed// sems can gang zag dngos mi 'jig/
dkar po'i chos rnams thams cad l/ shin tu bstan bar gnas pa bzhi// brtan po de dag 'jig rten na/ mya ngan 'da' bar reg gyur nas// mchod pa'i gnas su 'os bar 'gyur//
gang dag shes rab 'chal pa dang// le lo can dang dman la brtson// thos pa nyung dang sdig par 'dod// nga rgyal grwa ba khro 'byung gnas// mgo la spu gri sten byed cing
kha bsgyur ros kyis gyon// stong ba nyid ni don med pa// de'i mkhas pa sgom mi byed// chos la sun 'byin theg chen gyi// bsngags pa ma yin rjod par byed//
gung zhag rjes 'debastan ba rnams// ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du// nag po'i phyogs la kun tu chugs// de ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis
de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang/ dag slong dadag dang/ lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas ba'i 'jig rtan yi rangs te/ bcom
zla ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan
bo dzi na mi tra la sogs pa dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/// @#// rgya gar skad du/ A lo kA
nu brtan ma mahA yAn sU tA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su mthun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba klog pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyus dang byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos ba dus gcig na/ thub pa'i rgyal bo ro lo bzhugs// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang// nyan thos rnams
kyis mdun gyis bltas// de nas mkhas pa 'jam dbyangs kyis// btud de rgyal la 'di skad gsol// slad ma'i skya bo rnams slad du// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol//
sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan 'byung// zab cing rgya chen phun sum tshogs// mdo sde dan pa blo rab kyis// smra ba'i mchog gas bshad du gsol// 'jig rten mgon po thugs skyes/
sras gces 'a dzin mchog la bka' stsal pa// rtse gcig sems su yid byos la// nyonatsag dan bshad par bya// blo dang ldan pas yon tan zhus// de bzhani gshags
pas bka' stsal pa// chos smra sems can mchog rnams kyis// chos nyid de ni mnyan par gyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams dpag med las// rang sangs rgyas n thams cad dang/
nyan thos dag gse rnam kun tu // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus bsags ban// de bzhan gshegs pa spros med la// byas pa spros la spyod pa yi// sems can kun gyi rgyal brnawa//
ragis par mi nus smos ci dgos// sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas dang// sangs rgyus chos nyid gang yin dang// rang byung sku shugs ni 'dradang/ shes rab ci 'dra rab tu mkhyen//
'jig rten du ni 'jig rten sgron// rnam par 'dren pa rnams 'byung yang// 'jig rten dang ni 'dres med pa// 'jig rten du yang snang ba ston// sku dang sku yi 'phrin las dang
gsung gi gang dag brjod pa dang// yid dang mdekyi rnam rtog rnams// rgyal ba'i thams cad 'jig rten 'das// 'jig rtenanan shugs ba rtse bas// 'jig
rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa// 'jig rten ji ltar rtogs ba bzhin/ sems can rnams la chos stan to// 'jig rten 'das pa 'i spyod rnams kyi// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag
'bags// de dag 'phrin las 'jig rten 'das/ rnam par smin pa sman med// gal te 'jig rten rnam 'dren rnams// 'jig rten mthun par mi 'jugan// sangs rgyas chos nyid
gang yin dang// sangs rgyas sus kyang shes ma 'gyur// 'jig rten kun la na bzhad ba// skyob pa rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'o// rang byung sdug pa mi mnga' ba// de dag g.yo ba
bsam mi khyab// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku// 'khrig pa las ni byung mne la// yab dang bum yang ston mdzad pa// 'di na 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// bskal pa bye
deb grangs med nas// shes rab pha rol phyin las byung// 'on kyang byas pa nyid ston pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin//sangs rgyas 'od ni dpag med de// phyogs bcu dag tu
snang mdzad kyang// 'dom gang 'od du ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// mi yi dam pa nam du yang// zhabs gnyes sa lami rig ste/ 'on kyang lam srang de
za0 ston ba// 'di ni 'jig nyes 'dzad nas bzung nas// rtobs/ phyin samosani sgrol madz+dzabasman mthun 'jug min// gnyas
ston ba// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yani// 'dod pa de dag rnam smad de/ 'dod pa'i rdzas las yang dag 'bags// 'on kyang brag la sogs ston pa// 'di na 'ji'i//
na mthun 'jug na// mar me mdzad nas bzung nas su// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags bral// sgra gcan zin 'asras zhes gsungs// 'di ni 'jig rtena'athun 'jug
yin lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la// ngan mchog ces bka' stsal pa// phyi nas nos ni tshul mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// grub chen 'dzamashing grab
ma la bzhugs te bsam gtan mdzad bstan pa// lo drug bar du dka' spyad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// gnyis su med pa'i zhing 'din// byang chub
snying por bzhugs nas// bdud 'dul rnam par ston mdzad pa// 'don 'jig rten mthun 'jug yani// byang nub mtshungs med sangs rgyus te// lhar bcas 'jig rten
ston yin yang// thugs las chung ngu nyid ston pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// dang 'a bo thugs rje rgyaldan pa// bstan pa'i phu'i na 'dir gshegs la// gsol/
bas/ @#// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug man// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la// byon dang bzhugs pa mi mnga' yang// 'on kyang bzhud pa rnam snang ba//
'din 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// rgyal ba rnams ni mkha' 'dra ste// chos rnams kun la mi gnas kyang// ldang pa ltar yang snang ban// 'din 'jig rten 'phrin 'jug/
yin/ zhabasani bad+ma'i 'dab 'dra ste// de dag rdul gyis mi gos la// zhabs kyang 'khru bar mdzad pa ni// 'din 'jig rten mthun 'jug man// dedag dri mami mnga' ste//
sku na gsar gyi mdog 'dra yang// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khrus mdzad pa// 'di ni'ajig rtenamathun 'jug yin// lan pad+ma'i dri ldan zhing// tshems ni dri mad mu tig 'dra//
on kyang tshoms shang gsol mdzad pa// 'di ni'ajig rten mthun 'jug yin// dedag bkres ba mi mnga' yang// dedag zhal zas gsol mdzad cing// sbyin pa bo las 'bras bu mo/
'din 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// skumakhrags rdo rje 'dra ba'i ba'i// bag ba dag na mi rung ba yang// gshang ba'i sar ni gshegs mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug
yin/ de dag skrun ni mi mnga' yang// dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad pa'i phyir// sman kyang ston par mdzad pa na// 'di na 'jig rten mthun 'jug min// sangs rgyas yon tan
ma kun ldan te// sku la 'gyur ba mi mnga' yang/ de dag rgya ba ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rtenamathun 'jug ni/ 'jig rten khamasanadabag med pa// zhabs kyi ma lnga bsag mdzad
ba 'on kyang 3ma chung ston mdzad pa// 'don 'jib rten mthun 'jug yin// yid kyi sku dang ldan pas na// de bzhin gshegs pa chos sku yang/ rnagacan sku ni ston mdzad pa//
'dan 'jig rten mthun 'jug yani/ sangs rgyas rnam rtogam mnga' yong// soms can spyod yul ji bzhanadu// de dag spyod pa rnam par rtog/ 'di ni 'jigarten mthun 'jug yin//
de dag rtag tu mnyam bzhag la// 'greng dang bzhugs dang bzhud pa dang// de bzhin rnal bar rnal bar yang// 'dan 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thub dga' la//
grang dang tshe dang grib ma dang// de bzhin nyi ma ston mdzad pa// 'dAni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ tshangs pa'i khyim na tshangs pa ltar// rgyal ba rtag par na bza' gsol// 'on kyang n
ba zagalen mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// spyi gtsug bltar n mi mthong bya'i// sa gris gcod du yod med kyang// dgu 'dreg bar ni ston mdzad pa// 'di na 'jig rten
mthun 'jug yin// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rab bsgoms te// de dag rdzu 'phrul rnam ston la// bsam gtan mdzad par snang ba yang// 'din 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// 'jig rten/
sa u rna ma bar 'dren pa kun// ro bro mchog rnams brnyes gyur kyang// ngan ngon dag ni ston mdzad pa// 'din 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// bsod nams ma zad thams
cad kyis// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'phags// 'on kyang ma rnyed ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// dga' ba'i zas ni mngon basgrubs te// bskal ba
ts+tsa bya par bzhugs mdzad kyang// rtag tu zhal zas gsol mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// bsod nams pha rol phyin pas 'phags// lha yi na bza'arnyed gyur
kyang phyag dar khrod pa gsol mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// 'og min gzhal med khang pa rnams// rnam 'dren rnams kyis yongs spangs te// rtswa khyim
rnams ni ston mdzad pa// 'di 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// 'dren pa rnams zhal dbugs kyis// rgya mtsho chen po skams mdzad kyang// ma pa'i skyabs kyang rab 'dzin pa//
'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// bdud rnams bye bdapag med pa// thugs bskyedatsam gyis 'dul mdzad kyang// bdud kyi bgegs rnams ston mdzad pa// 'dani 'jig rten/
'thun 'jug yin// nga dang nga zhes lta ba gang// de narang byung rnams la med// 'on kyang nga dnganga'i zhes gsungs// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// skyob pas nags rgyas chos kun 'a
mi mkhyen pa ni mi mnga' yang// gzhan la yongs su 'dri mdzad pa// 'di na 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// rnam par 'dren pa 'byung mdzad kyang// zab
tu dben bar snang ba ste// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// de dag sna tshogs sku med kyang// sems can mos pa ji bzhin du/ sku lus sprul pa mdzad pa na// 'di na 'jig rtenamathun
'jug yani/ 'jig rten kun gyi sgra skad kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo lo// 'on kyang sgra chung ston mdzad pa// 'don 'jig rten mthun 'jug ga/ rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyus spros mi mnga'// chos rnams kun la sa/sal gyur kyang// spros dang bcas par gsung mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// ming med pa yi chos kyis rnams/ bsam
du med pa'i mang dag gis// sems can rnams la longs brjod pa// 'dani 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// chos rnams sems can med pa dang// shin tu dngos po mad mkhyen la//
sems can mang po 'dul mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// gang gis lasabyas 'di nyid kyis// myong bar gyur pa ma yin yang// gang gis byas pa ston mdzad pa//
'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// chos rnams thams cad stong pa la// skyes bu mchog rnams mngon sum yang/ 'a po skye pa ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rtenamathun 'jug yin
'jig rten 'dinas srid gzhan du// su yang 'khor ba yong min la// 'khor ba yang ni ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// phung po dag dang/
khams rnams dang// skye mched rang bzhin gnag bzhed la// khamasagasum po dag stan mdzad pa// 'din 'jig rten 'thun 'jug mni// dus gsum dag tu sems can gyi//
rang bzhin dmigs pa ma yin lag/ sems can khams kyang ston mdzad pa// 'din 'jig rten mthun 'jug yani/ gang dag dza bzhin gzhan mni pa// chos rnams rtogs par thug
chud la// 'on kyang gzhag ba ston m da ba// 'di 'jig rten man 'jug yin// dam pa'i don du chos rnams kun// khrab pa rab tu mkhyen gyur la// sna tshogs su ni ston
mdzad pa// 'dran 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du// 'phags pa'ibaden pAston mdzad cing// brdzun bar yang ni ston mdzad pa// 'di na 'jige
rten mthun 'jug yin// bdud ne bya ba phrag brgya yis// dge 'dun dbye bar mi nus kyang// dga' dun dbyen ni ston mdzad pa// 'di na 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// chos gang
mang nim bslabs la/ (ba slabs pa yang gang yang med// slob dang mi slob ston mdzad pa// 'din 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// 'dus byas rnams kyi ngo bo nyid// ngo bo de
kyis grol ba cis med/ 'on kyang rnam par grol ba ston// 'din 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/ ngan 'das la 'gro mad kyang// dgra btsem de ni 'gro 'od zhes/ samtshan/
rnams la de bstan pa// 'du'i 'jig rten mthun 'jug mni/ don dang don min na gzegasal// 'gog pa dang na dem ba'i don// smra ba rnams kyi mchog gsungs pa// 'din
'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// dngos po med pa gsal ba'i chos// rnyog ba med par ba ston kyang// chos rnams nung blad med dus page/ 'din 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin//
chos rnams thams cad brjod med par// de bzhin gshegs pas rab mkhyen kyang// brjod padagani ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// sangs rgyas mkhyen
pa chags mi chung ga/ dus rnams kun tu mnyam gzhag kyang// dbang po rnams ni stod mdzad pa/ 'di na 'jig rten man 'jug ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i sku// sangs
rgyus cung zad mi ltung yang// dge slong byang chub yan lag smos// 'di na 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// sdig pa thamasacad yongs zad pas/ bsod nams kun gyis mngon
'bags kyang/ las kyi rgyu ni ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// skyob pa sang
kha yang skyon mdzad pa/ 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// de bzhin gshegs pa chos sku ste/ kha log ci 'dra bas de bzhin kun// 'on kyang tha dad skyon
mdzad pa// 'din 'jig rten mthun 'jug yani// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang// nyan thos so so'i skya bo dang// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// tshag gi las kyis
rab tu bye// sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yas kyi// tshes kyi dbyangs las byung yin yang// sangs rgyas zhing na ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// rdzogs
ba'i sangs rgyas bsamam khyab// de bzhin gshegs pa bsam mi khyab// sems can 'dul ba'i don gyi phyi'i/ 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// zag med yod pa ma yin/
yang de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos la// zag ba med pa nyid gsungs ngag/ 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yani/ mkhyen pas de dag galtas mni yang// dus gsum dugan rnam
gzugs shing// gnas kyis 'du shes ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// sangs rgyas chos nyidi gang yin dang// sangs rgyas 'gi pa su 'dod pa// dan chos
dbyangs zhusashes pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// skyob mad pa badrod bsten pa// rtag tu yang dag rab tu mkhyen// mkhyen nasab tu ston mdzad pa// 'don 'jig rten
sa/ mthun 'jug yin// rtag tu myos kyi dbyangs mtshungs te// 'jug ba mad tsang 'byur chud kyang// 'gro ba gnas ba ston mdzad pa// 'don 'jig rtenamathun 'jug lani// mi skye ba la gcig
ba 'am/ mang po yod pa ma yin yang// sna tshogs rim pa ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// de dag thadad sku mad kyang// sangs rgyas zhing rnams dpag med du//
sku lus dag ni sprul mdzad pa/ 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// stong gsum bya ba brgya bgrangs pa// sangs rgyas zhing du brjod bya ba// pa ni skye ba ston mdzad pa// 'di 'jib/
rten mthun 'jug yin// de bzhin gshegs pas dus kun tu // chos ni gnas par rab mkhyen kyang// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba 'don 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// sangs
rgyus 'od ni dpag med tsang// sku lus dpag tu med min yang// dpag tu yod par ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// chos kyi dbyangs la brtog med de// dus
gsum dag tu stong nyid kyang// mchog gnyis rnams ston mdzad pa// 'din 'jig rten mthun 'jug min// zhagi bachad cing skye mod la/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam gyur kyang//
bsrab pa'i bskal pa ston mdzad ga/ 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// chos kyi dbyingasani grub mad de// de la ngo bo 'di med kyang// 'on kyang nges par 'byung ston pa// 'di
ni'ajig rtenamathun 'jug yin// gzugs ba yang ma mnga'// ldog mgrong gsan gzigs gyur cing/ lta ba thams cad ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig
mthun 'jug yin/ chos rnams kun la byed pa ga/ shin tu yod pa ma yin yang// byas dang ma byas ston mdzad pa// 'di 'gi rta mthun 'jug yin// mya ngan 'das dang nam
ma bar ni// rgyal pa bgrangs su ma tshud kyang// khams kyi grangs rnams ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// grangs med stobs rnams rnyed gyur la/ mthu las
nyams pa mi mnga' yang// zham nga ba dag tshol mdzad pa// 'dani 'jig rten mthun 'jug lani// nams kyang byis pa'i blo ldan dang// sangs rgyas 'dras pa mi mnga' yang//
byas pa de dag 'dul mdzad pa/ 'di ni 'jig rten mjun 'jug yin// yon tan ldan pa thams cad kyis// pha rol de bzhin gshegs byon yang/ de la de bzhin gzhan zhes
ba 'din 'jig rten mthun 'julu in// mi skye ba ni rtag tu skye// de dag rgyu las byung man yang// ma rab rgyan gyis 'byung zhes pa// 'di na 'jig rtenamathun 'jug yin//
rgyal ba rnyed dang bkur sti las// sgrib pa mad ba nyid brnyes la// chog shes pan ston M mdzad pa// 'di na 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// gangan sems can 'dul yodapar
sam snang bden ni 'dren pa rnams// de dag spyod bya ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/rag ba gsum gyi tshogs bsags te// reg ba bskyed par des ba ston/
'dala'athong ba tsa lang mad// 'dani 'jig rten mthun 'jug ni// 'jig rten sgron ma grams cad du/ skye bo dpag tu med pa 'dul// gleng gzhi dag kyang ston mdzad pa/ 'di
ni 'jig rten mashun 'jug yin/ 'jig rten gsum po gang na yang// chos gang phung po gnas pa med// 'on kyang chos bsgrub bkra' stsal ba// 'din 'jig rten mthun 'jug
yin/ mtha' gsum gnam thar skyes pa// de bzhin gshegs rnams ston mdzad pa// sems can rnams la rab ston pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yane/ chos rnams kun/
gyi rgyud mkhyen nas// 'di 'pho skye ba rnam spungs ga de dag thams cad ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten man 'jug yin/ mi skya ba ni gang mgrongag ma 'go de ni shes bag//
go ba bskyod bar ston mdzad ga/ 'di 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus gang ga man yang// sems can longs su sman bya'i phyir/ 'byung bdagan bsam
la khyab// 'din 'jig rten mthun 'jug yani// gang dag mdo sde 'di 'dra 'di// phyi ma'i dusan gros 'gyur nang/ the tshem mdal shes 'gyur ba// dad ga sngon rgya la bamagong
ba// 'jig rten mgon gyis de gsungs nas// sras po 'jam pa'i dbyangs la sogs// rab tu dga' zhing ya rangs te// ston pa'i bka' la mngon par bstod//
phags pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su mthun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i med rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ dAnanI/
kha dang/ zhu chen gyi latso ba ban d+ha yashes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcosanas gtan la phab pa/// rgyagar
skad du/ A na ya ta ani ya tag ti mutA/ a paM ta ra nAm mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sams dpa' thams cad la phyag 'al lo// 'di skad bdag gas thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khaban/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i
ri la dag slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dgo slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang nub soms dba' bye ba khrag khrage 'bum phrag drugachu la 'ad lta ste/ 'jam dbala gzhon nur gyur pa dang//
gran ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ mthu chen thob dang/ smanagyi rgyal po dang/ sman gyis yang dag 'phags dang// mchod rten mngon par bsgrags ba'i sgra skad rgyal po dang/ de dag la
sogs ba byang chub sems dapa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu thams cad kyang rab tu la/ rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa/ zabacang brtan pa'i chu'i rgyu
mtsha'adusarlabs kyi tang nge 'dzan grub pa// dbang bskur ba'i gzungs thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa'i gzungs thob pasha stag dang thabs tsagi
chu bzhugs te/ de nas bam ldan 'das laM/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya gang gas byang chub sems dpa' 'di
dbani bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu ma nges te/ bla med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir ldog par 'gyur ba'o// byang chub sems dba' 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/ dran med ba'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog pa'o zhes bgyi bar bdag gse 'a la bar 'gyurab/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges pa dang
ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangasangastan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dbal gnonanur gyur
ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ Na'ajam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ban lnga po 'di dag yin te/ lnga gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang//
glang bo rtsa' shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang/ zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro blta bu dang/ nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis
'gro nga lta bu ste/ 'jam dpal lnga po de dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba yin no// 'jam dpal de la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' gsum n bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i 'gro ba yin no// 'jam dpalagyis gsol ba/
bcom ldan 'das byang chub samasadapa' bla na med pa drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba pa/ blan med pa'i ya shes kyi lam las slar ldog pa dag gang lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro pa lta bu dang/ glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin te/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems
dpa' 'di gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu ma nges te/ sman mo dpa'i ye shos kyi lam las phyir ldog pa yin no/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' zla ba ni
mas 'gro ba lta bu dang/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba pa lta bu dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu 'di gsum
ba00ni ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tunges te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ya shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog pa yin// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems pa 'a
byugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin par go bar bya zhen/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dperan sgyus bu la la zhagyisangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten
gyi khams rnams 'da' bar 'dod la/ dren lung de'i bya ba dang/ bya ba chen po dang/ don dang/ don chen po dang/ chad na ba dang/ ched che ba rtsag yod nas/ de 'di snyam du sems//
bdag gas bzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gsi 'jig rten gyi khams de dag bda' bar bya ba snyam mo// de'ang 'ad snyam du dbyod de/ smral bdag thugs kyi shing rta la zhon la 'jig rten gyi kha
de dga' da' bar bya gor ma chag snyam sta 'jam dpal ma de phyugs kyi shing rta la zhon te lam der zhugs nas/ dmun rang zhung dus ring mo zhige na shu dbagatshad brgyar phyin pa
las/ de rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas bzlogs nas/ dpag tshad brgyad cur phyir ded de phul na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ mdas bskal pa gcig gam/
bskal ba brgya 'am/ bskal pAstong ngam/ bskal ba bye ba phrag 'bum mam/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dga' da' ba 'am/
'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jamadapal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de na gnasam mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de na sus
ma mchis te/ byugs kyi shing rta la 'tshal ba'i mi des bskalapa gcig gam/ bskul ba brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ma/ bskal babye ba phrag 'bum mam/ bskal pa brjod du med/
( ba'i yang brjod du med bas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jamadapal de bzhin
du 'gos kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ theg pa chen po ma 'dzin mi klog pa nyan thos kyi thig pa pa
rnams dang lhan cig gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la bstan tsang stan la bsnyen bkur byed cing/ de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dres pa byed l/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par
khyed la kun dga' ra ba 'am gtsug lag khang ma/ 'chag sar spyod yulamathunapar gnas par byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klogatsang kha ton byed/ spyod cing khong du chud
bar byed l/ gzhan dag kyang klog tu 'jug pa nas/ khong du chud pa'i bar du byed na/ de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa mngon par 'du byed pa des
mkhag gsar ba tshul bor 'gyur te/bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'drenacing phyir bzlog go/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sams bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab
kyi dbang po/ shes rab kyi bge gang yin pa de'ang de nyan thos kyi thig pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dag ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rgyal por byed cing nyams par byed/
do 'jam dpal dbar namel la zhag mag nad kyis mag zum par gyur nas/ de mig dbye nga dang byams su rung bar bya ba'i phyi'i zla ba gcig gi bar du dpyad byas te// sgrub
gcig ga lenanas mag byed cing 'dzums par byed pa las/ de'idagra 'am mi mdza' ba gzhan zhig gis bi pa lang gi bya ma spadra gang gis mig bkang nas de'ang long bar byas pa de bzhin
du 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' do'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de deng de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing
'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed tsang nyams par byed de/ 'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' khyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin pas yig
bar bya'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro lta bu yin par rig par bya zhen/ 'jam dpal dbanganam lo la zhagi 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid
ka @#// 'da' bar 'dod la/ de la der yang de'i bya ba dang/ bya ba chen po dang/ don dang/ don chen po dang/ ched che pa dang/ ched mya rab gi yod nas/ de 'di snyam du
i sams te/ bdag gsabazhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da'akhar bya snyam mo// de'ang 'di snyam dudabyod do// ma la bdag glang po che'i shing rta yan lag brgyad dang
ldan pa la zhon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'dra'i bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas/ 'jam dpal mi de glang po che'i shing rta yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la zhon te lam der zhugs nas/ de lo
brgyas dbag tshad nyis stong du son pa las/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas phyi'i yul te bzlog na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ glang po che'i shing rta la zhon pa'i mi des
bskal pa 'dug gam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med bas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
gtsug kyang 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ni skabs ma mchis te// glang po ma'i
shing rta 'tshol ba'i mi des bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal ba bye ba phrag 'bum mam/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du mdangs
kyang 'jig rten gyi khams btsag kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal depa'i ni du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo gang la la nagi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu sams bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi thig pa pa dag dang lhan cig gnas te/ nyan gles kyi theg pa padag la bstanatsang
ston la bstan bkur byed cing/ de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed la/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ gtsug lag khang sa/ 'jug
sar spyod yul mthun par gnas par byed// nyan thos kyi theg pa klog cing kha ton byed spyod cing khong du chud par byed la
byed du 'jug la yong su sbyong bar byed du 'jugan/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dgu ba'i rtsa ba bskudapa mngon par 'du byed pa ngas shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/ blan med pa'i yi
shes kyi lam las phyi'adrenacing phyir bzlog go/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sams bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa'i shes rab kyi dbang
bo shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de'ang de'i nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin tsang 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed do// 'jam
sa/ ukla// dang la dpar nang gi sdong po chen po srid du dpag tshad stong zhig yod la/ de'ang rgya mtsho chen po khyer ba las/ bar snang la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dgags de rgya mtshor na
yi po'i lam las phyir phul te zlog nas/ de la lcags kyi gar du dpag tshad lnga stong yod pa zhig btagasan/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ shing gi sdong po chen po de rgya mtsho chen po la/
'gro ba 'am/ sems can bsgral ba'i phyir spyad par nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de nam lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dzam

dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sams bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi shing chen po'ang nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dag ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa/
des thams cad mkhyen pa'i gshes kyi rgya mtsho las byar thulazhing bzlogs te/ thams cad mkhyenapa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtshor yang 'gro bar yang ma 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i rgya molas kyang
sems can rnams sgrol mi nus te/ 'jamadapal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar byung chub sems dpa'
te ma dang zla bas 'gro ba lta bu la yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpaladapar na mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang/ bya ba chen/ ngo
[o/ ]po dang/ don dang/ don chen po dang/ ched me pa dang/ med rab tsag yod nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag/
'da' bar bya snyam mo// de'ang 'di snyam du dpyod do// ma la bdag gis nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas 'a jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chag stam nas/ 'jam dpal ma de na
ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas lam der zhugs na/ 'dzamadabala'ade ji snyam du soms/ mi de 'am dung zla ba'i 'gro ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar nusasam/ 'jam
dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo thigs lags so// bde bar gshegs nga yun ring po dus range mo zhig gas rdo gas lags so// com ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhagegs blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg
pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa ba dag la mi bsten cing me ston la bsnyen bkur ma byed/ nyan thos kyi theg ba pa de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par mi byed/
kun tu spyod cing longs spyod nga ra ma byed/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'dug sar spyod yul mthun par gnas par mi byed la/ nyan thosaMkyi theg pa klog par/
ku@#/ gam byed/ kha ton ma byed/ sems par ma byed la gzhan dug kyang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi byed/ kha ton byed du 'jug par
ma byad de/ de gang klog ba'ang theg pa chen po ban klog la/ gang ston pa de'ang theg pa chen po kho na ston na/ 'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta
bya ba yin bar rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal dparan nam mkha' lding ga dbang po chen po'i rgyal po chen po lang tsho dang/ stobs dang/ mthu chen po thob pa yin 'dod na/ ri rab
kyi rtse monas rab kyi rtse mor 'gro'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sams dpa' tshul khrims dang/ thos pa dang/ bsamab dang/ lhag
ba'i bsam pa'i stobs dang/ lang tsho dang/ mthu chen po theb ba'ang 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nasasangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing/ de bzhin gshags pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor rnams su ston par byed do// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sa mas dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu yin par rig par bya zhan 'jam dpal dngar na mi la
zhagi 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'de 'da' bar 'dod la/ dor yang de'i bya ba dang/ bya ba chen po dang/ don dang/ don chen po dang/ chedachi ba dang/ rtsod tshe rapa cage yod nas//
[z/ ]de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo// de 'di snyam du dbyod do// ma la bdag nyan thos kyi rdza
'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya'o snyam mo// 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ pa des nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' ba'i
nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ngo thogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am//
rigs kyi bu mos gang la la zhage slan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dung lhan cig tu mi gnas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa ba dag lam
bsnyen mi ston cing bsnyen bkur mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dres par mi byed/ kun tu spyod de longs spyod par ma byed/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/gtsug
lag khang ngas/ 'jug sar spyod yul mthun par ' gnas par mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi thig pa klog par mi byed// kha ton mi byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par mi byed la/ gzhan
dag kyang ba na tshig sa su bcad pa gtsag tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi byed/ kha ton byed du 'jug bar mi byed de/ gang klog bde'ang theg pa chen po kho na klogal/ gang ston pa de'ang
dra0// theg pa bon ston cing/ theg pa chen po la khon mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang theg pa chen po yongs su
'dzan pa rnams la gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas pa byed cing/ der gzhol/der 'bab/ der bab na de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ de dag la bstenatsang stan la bston
bkur byed/ de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed/ kun tu spyod cing yos spyod par byed/ kun dga' ra ba dam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'amag sar spyod yul mthun pas/
gnas par byed la/ de thog pa chen po yongs su tshol zhing sdud la 'chang bar byed/ mar ma dang/ bdug pa dang/ ma tog dang/ spos dang/ ma tog 'phrang dang/ byug pa dag
giso mchog tu gus pas mchod par byed/ de klog pan po klog cing kha ton byed la/ dga' ba dang// mchog tu dga' bas lung 'bog par byed/ mabaslabs pa'i byang chub
soms dpa' rnams la brtas pa'i sems mi skye 1 bzhin 'dzum pa dad gsong por smral/ tshig mi bslang/ mi kho tum mi rtsub pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ snyan par skrunang/ de
srog gi byare yang theg pa chen po me spong la/ da thag pa na bol zhugs pa'i byang sems dpa' rnams dang/ theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang/ theg pa chen po yongs su
0 'dzin pa rnams latsanus lcogs kyis snying nas lhag pa'i bsam pas yongasasu 'dzin par byed de/ desudang yang lhan ge 'gyod ba dang rtsodapa mi khyer la/ de sngon ma byung ba dang
ma byon pa'i mdo sde rnams tshol ba'i rang brten can yin nange/ gang dag las rkyes pa de dag la ston pa la gus pa drag po ltadu snyad par bad byang chab samamadapal
padan sa dka dan na cha nas nan bsha0na an nang/ gang dag las byas pa de dag la ston pa la gus pasrog po lta bu skyod par byed/ byang chub soms dpa' gzhan byang chub
sems dpa'i spyod pa la ma bslabs pa dag la khyad du gsod par ma byed la/ nyes pa'i dan pa dang mi bdenapas gzhan dag la gleng bar mi byed pa/ nyes pa gzhan gyi 'khrul pa'i ng mtshilaM
nang byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyomasal slob pa 'dini/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dapa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu ba yin par rig
par bya'o// 'jam dang la ji ltar byang chub sems dang 'a de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdza'aphrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par gre bar bya zhe na/ 'jamadapal dperanam la la zhage'ajig rten
gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang/ bya ba chen po dang/ don dang/ don chen bo dang/ ched che ba dang/ ched merab cage yod nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/
[s a]kya/ bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab par go ba chug snyam nas/ 'jam dpalam de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song nas gsol ba btab sta/
shi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar 'tshal to/ de yang bdag gso bgyi ba dang/ bgyi ba chen po dang/ donadang/
don chen po dang ched che ba dang/ ched che rab tsug mnos// bcom ldan 'das kyi ba dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'du 'bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas la/ 'jam dpal de sanan/
gshegs bsakyang mi de 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar mdzad na/ 'jam dpal 'du ji snyam du sems/ dngazhan ga shegs pas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag myurd 'da'
bar mdzad spyod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis gso'ab/ bcom ldan 'das spyod lags so// bde bar gshegs paspyod lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
'jamadapa' de bzhin du cigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhagi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu sems bskyed la/ na thos kyi theg pa ba dang lhan cig tu
pa gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la mi bston ma stan cing bsnyen bkur ma byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa ba de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dres par mi byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs
[s/ ]spyod bar mi byed/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chagasa' spyod yul mthun bar gnas par mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa krog par mi byed/ kha ton ma byed/
dpyod cing khong du chud par mi byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bran tshigs su bcad pa gcig kyang klog tu 'jug par ma byed/ kha tonami byed/ 'jug par mi byed/ de'ang klog pa de'ang gleg
pa chen po kho na glogi/ gang kha ton byed pa de'ang sreg pachen po kho na la rton byed/ gang ston pa kho na de'ang theg pa chen poston tsang/ de lus dang/ drag dang/ yid yongs sudag la/
tshul khrims dang ldan nang/ dag pa'i ngos can yin la/ gzhan dag kyang lus dang/ ngag dang/ lade yongs su dag pa la 'god/ tshul khrims dang dag pa'i ngos na la 'god/ dzeg
pachen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang/ theg ba chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la gus pa dang ba nus/ zhe sa dang bcas par
byad la/ dor gzhol/ de 'bug der babang de dag dang lhan tsagatu gnas te/ de dag la bstanatsang stan la/ bstan bkur byed tsang/ de dag dang lhan tsug tu 'dris par byed/ kun tu
spyod cing longs spyod bar khyad la/ de dag dang kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'jug sa spyod tshul mthun bar gnas par byed/ da thagapachen po yongs surtsol nang
'dug la 'chang bar byed/ mar me dang/ bdug pa dang/ ma tog dang/ spos dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ byug pa dag gis mchog tu gus pa drag pos mchod par
byed de/ thegapa chen po klog cing kha ton byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba chen podrag bos klog tu 'jug cing/ kha ton byed du 'jug/ ma bslabs pa'
zla byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyas ba'i sems che bskyad la/ byang chub sems dpa' gazhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god par byed/ de bzhin 'dzum zhango gsong por smra
la/ gzhan dag kyang pazhani 'dzum zhang gsong bo smra ba la 'god/ de tshig mi bslang/ ma ga dus/ mi rtse ba la/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de khon la 'god tsang de dag 'a ba dang snyan par
smra la srog gi bya'i yang theg pa chen po mi spong zhing/ da theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang/ theg pa chen po yo su
'dzin pa rnams la gus pa sngog bodang/ das 'a ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba chen pos sri zhu bya ba'i bu'i nyibar gnasal/ gzhan dag kyang bsam pa chen po dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pas
bslab/ de kho na la 'god par byed/ gu dang yang lhan cig 'gyod pa dang rtsod par mi byed/ de sngon ma 'byung ba dang/ ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams gus pa drag pos don du gnyer
zhing tshol ba dang ( gang dag las khyos bu de dag la ston pa la gus pa drag po ltadu skyod par byed la/ gzhan dag kyang ba slob pa de kho na la 'god/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
gabaslab pa rnams la'ang rlom sems mi byed/ nyes pa bden pa dang mi bden pas gzhan dag la gleng bar ma byed/ nyes pa gzhan dag gis 'khrul pa'i ng ma 'tshal/ gzhan dgakyang
bslabu pa chen la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa' las rud sbos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' las chud zos/
pa'i sanusan gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa' lam chud zos pa' sems can gyi khamasu la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang
byang chub sems dpa' lam chud khros pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dapa'i spyad pa rgyud bros pa'i sems can gyi 'ams la
rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu chud
thos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ do
byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la ma bas pa chud zos pa'isamasacan gyi khams la rnamarar lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la
ma pas pachud zos babasamasacan gyi khams la rnam bar lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bya rub sems dpa'i byab chud bros pa'i sims can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/
gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dba'i byang rgyud bros pa'i sems na gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ da byang chub sems dpa' mngon bar 'du byed pa'i spyod pa'i stobs
chud bros pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnamapar lta bar byed/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'du byed pa'i spyod pa'i stobs chud zosapa' sems can gyi khams
la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba'i gnas rgyud bros pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam bar lta ba la byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems
dpa' spyod pa'i gnas chud zos ba'i sems tshan gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed la/ de byams pa dang/ snying rje chen podang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms
chud zosapa'i samasatsan gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dgakyang byams pa dang/ snying rjedang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms chud zos pa'i sems can
gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bgo bsha' rar bzhanatsan yin la/ gzhan dag kyang bgo bsha'i rang bzhin can la 'god par byed/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos chud/
gros pa ni sems can gyi khams la rnamakhar lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rlud bros ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de dag ba'i/
chos la 'dun pa dang bral ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i byed la/ gzhan dag kyang deg ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang brul pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par ltang la 'god par/
byed de bdung bas btungs pa'isems can gyi khams la rnam par rtobar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang gtsang bas bcings pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'godapar byed//
de yun ring bo nas na ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam bu lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang kun dang bo nas ni ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/
de sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa chud zos ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed l/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas la dag ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa chud zos pa'i
sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de mgon med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang mgon med pa'i sems
[geo ]/can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de yun dang po nas gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba byed la/ gzhan dag
kyang yun ring po nas gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can gyi khamasal rnam par lta bal 'god par byed/ du rigs ngan du skyes pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar
( byed la/ gzhan dag kyang rigs ngan du skyes pa'i sems can gyis khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ da byang chub kyisams chud zos pa'i samasacan gyi khams
la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub kyi sams chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa rlud bros pa'i ams can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bal
'god par byed/ de chos kyi spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed laM/ gzhan dag kyang chos kyi spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam
bar lta ba la 'a god par byed/ de bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bsod nams dang ya
shes kyi tshogs chud zos pa'isems can gyi khams la rnam par lta pa kAn 'god par byed/ de gyes pa chen po la mos pa chud zos ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed
la gzhan dag kyang theg pa chen po la mos pa chud zos pa'i samasacan gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ da tshul khrims kyi sdom pa rgyud bros pa'i sems can gyi
khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa chud bros pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos
dud bros bsags pan gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang ngos kyi rjesasu mthun pa'i chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed
da bgrod pa dang des pa chud bros pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bzod pa dang des pa nud bris pa'i sa mas can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la
'god nga ra byed/ de [‚Äù] zhi gnas dang lhag mthong rgyud bros pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par ltar byed la gzhan dag kyang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chud dres pa'i sanas
can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ do sbyin pa dang/ dul ba dang/ legs par sdom pa dar/ des pa chud zos nga' sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar
@#// byed/ gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa dang/ dul ba dang/ legs par sdom pa dang/ des pa chud bros pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/dadran pa dang/
blo gros dang/ brtan pa dang/ rtogs b.rud sbos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bur byed l/ gzhan dag kyang dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/ brtan ba dang/ rtogs parlud bros ba'i
sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa chud bros ba'i samasacan gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang pha
rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa chud bros ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skya ba rlud bros pa'i sems sman gyi
khamasal rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi rigs suskyab nud thos pa'i samasacan gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de dag ba'i bshes
gnyenatshud bris pa'i sims can gyi khams la rnam bar lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dag pa'i bshes gnyen chud bros pa'i sems n gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god
par byed/ de sems can la pan par 'dod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sems can la phan par 'dod pa chud zos ]
pa'i samasacan gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed// de chos la rton pa chud zos ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang rnyes la rton pa tshu
bros pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de ye shes la rton pa rlud bros pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang ye shes la
rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de don la rton pa nud bros pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang don la rton
pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god bang byed/ de nges ba'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems na gu khums la rnam pa lta bar byed l/ gzhan
dag kyanges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa rlud bros pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de yang dag par spong ba bzhi chud bros pa'i sems can gyi khams lanam/
bar lta bar byed l/ gzhan dag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi chud zos pa 'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bden pa'i ris dang don dang
'dul ba smra ba la mkhas pa yin la// zhan dag kyang bden pa'i chos dang/ don dang/ 'dul ba smra ba la mkhas pa la 'god par byed// de dbul po'i sems can gyi khams la rnam
par lta bar byed cing/ gzhan dag kyang dbul po'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de 'jig rten thams cad byams pas khyab par byed de/
kyi ma soms na 'di dag ni mgon med pa/ sems can 'di dgan skyabs med pa/ sems can 'di dag ni dpung gnyen med pa/ sems can 'di dag na gling mad pa/ sems can
'di dag ni gnas med pa// soms na 'di dag ni skyob pa med pa yin na/ kye mnam nagi na bdag sems can 'direg gi mgon du gyur cig gu/ skyabs su gyur cig gu/ dpung gnyen du gyur cig gu/
rgyung gyur cig gu/ gnas su gyur cig gu/ skyob par gyur cig gu skam mo// 'jam dpal dpar na bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding lang tshodang/ stobs dang/ mthu chen
pa thob pa don 'dod n/ ri rab kyi rtse mo nas ni rab kyi rtsa mor 'gro'i// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro nga lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i yang
ngago ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang/ mgyogs pa dang/ shugs dang/ rtsol ba chen pos de bzhin gshags pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang du skye bar 'dod pa der yang skyobar 'gyur la/
ngan song ngan 'gro log par lhung ba skyes ba'i sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang/ skyabasadang/ dpung gnyen dang/ glang dang/ gnas dang/ skyob par yang 'gyur ba de na/ ]
['jam dbal byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal rags kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhagi gas
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyen gtsag bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phul zhang/ lha'i na
bza' dug kyang phul to/ de bzhin gshegs pa ro la'ang nyinugatsagi bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyad nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos yongs su gang bar byas
nas spen pa byin te/ de ltar nepa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad du phul la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan zhagi gsan sems can gcig rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'brasabul bzhagan/ 'dinadi bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyod do// 'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhag gis phyogos ba' 'jig
chen gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyibu tshu gzhan zhig gsAni
sems can gcig lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyod do// 'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo gang la la zhagod gas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi sems can thams cad lan cig phyi'i 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'a
bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan 'ge gse ni sems can gcig pu mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa/
skyad do// 'jam dang larigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhag gis phyogs nu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyisams na thums
cad phu'i ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyabu mo gang gzhan zhig gas na sems can gcig dgra bcom pa nyade la bzhag na/ 'di na de bas ches
bsod nams grangs med ba skyid do// 'jam dpal rags kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhag gas phyogs bcu'i 'jagi rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad/
kyi sams tsan thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ gas kyi bu mo gzhan dag gse nesems can gcig rang sangs rgyas nyid la bzhagan/ 'din dbas
sa bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rnages kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rang kyi
rdul snyad kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhage gas sems can gtsag ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sam/
la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi bams thams
cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi sems can shums cad ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sams na
gcig mang po ma'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di nid byas nas bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal ragasakyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
gang la la zhag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamasakhrums cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi sems can thams cad rlung po che'i shing rtas 'gro blta bu'i byang nub kyi sems la nga kod la//
rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gag zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'din du bas rnyes bsod nams grangs med
pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la nga la la zhag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi sems can
thams cad zla ba dang nyi gas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis nasems can gtsag nyan thos kyi
'phrul gyi 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhagan/ 'di ni de bas res bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal gyis kyi bu 'am/ gsal bu mo khang
la la zhig gas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mas cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi rdzu 'al rgyas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la
bkod la/ rags kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhag gse ni sems can gcig de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhagan/
'di ni de bas rmasabasod nams grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal rdzogs kyi bu 'am/ dwagyis kyi bu mo gang laMl zhag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i bras ro brgya dang ldan pa byan zhing/ lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ da ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi
byam snyad du byen la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhagi gsan dag bstan dad pa can gsum la skyabs su song ba/ bslab pa'i gni lnga dang ldan pa/ ngam
ldan 'das kyi bstan ba la mngon par dga' ba gcig la nyin gcig dran gcig byin na 'di ni de bas ke sa bsod nams grangs med ba bskyed do// 'jam dpal rags kyi bu'an dges/
kyi bu mo gang la la zhag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra'ab kyi rdul snyad kyi dge ba ston dad pa can gsum la skyabs su bod ba/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa
bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams la 'di gcig bzhin du sgyu'i bras ro brgya dang ldan pa byon zhing/ lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ da ltar sbyab 'gal ba ga'i
klung gi bye ma snyad du byani la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan dag gis ni gang zag brgyad pa la nyan gtsagi bran gcig khyon na/ 'di ni de bas rnyes bsod nams grangs med pa
bskyed do// 'jam dbal rigs kyi bu la/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhagi ba se phyogs bcu'i 'jige rdzun gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab gyi rdul snyad kyi gang brag brgyud pa rnams
la nyen gcig bzhin du lha'i bras ro brgya dang lhan ba byani zhing/ lha'i gos dag kyang byani te/ de ltar sbyin ba bskal ba gang+gA'i klung gi bya ba stod du byin l/ rigs kyi bu 'am gis
kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa gcig la ni gcig can gcig byed na/ 'di ni di bas chos bsod ms grangs med bskyod do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ gis
@#// kyi bu mo gang la la zhag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi rgyan du zhugs pa rnams la ni gtsag bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya
dang ldan pa byin zhing/ lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar spyin pa bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhag gas ni lan cig phyi
'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byanyin/ 'din de bas nas ngaso da nams grongs mad ngang skyod de// 'jam dpal rags kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhagi gas phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams lan gcig bzhin du lha'i bus ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing/ lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/
de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gas ni phyi'i mi 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig can gtsag bunan/ 'di ni da
bas rjes bsod nams grangs med pa skyang du/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bumo gang la la zhage gas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenagyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
skud kyi phyi'i mi 'ong nga rnams la ni gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pakhyen nang/ lha'i gos dag kyang byani// de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi byamasnyad du byin la/ ragis
kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gso ni dgra bcom pa gcig la nyin gcig zan gtsag byanan/ 'di na de bas rjes bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi
bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhagi gas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi dgra bcom pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan
pa byin zhing/ lha'i zas gos drag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa da'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byanel/ rigasakyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ rang sangs rgyas
gcig lan gcig zin gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas chos bsod nams grangs med pa skyod do// 'jam dpal ris kyi bu 'am/ rigasakyi bu mo gang la la zhag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig

rten gyi khams thums cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi ring sangs rgyas rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i bras ro brgya dang ldan pa byani 'dze/ lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal
pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad du byan la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhun nage gsan ra'i shing rtas 'grub lta bu'i byang chub sams dpa' gtsago la rten gtug can gcig byanin/
'din de bas ris bsod nams grangs med pa bskyod do// de'i phyir zhen/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang gi tshigang dang gang la btsums te byang chub kyisams skyed
pa de'i ni/ das sems de la mi dag pa'i las ma spangs pa ci'ang med la/ des sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang ma bzung ba mad pa'i phyir te/ 'jam dpal de ltar
in ngang drub san sa dpa' rnams ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan ng yin no// 'jam dpal dpar na bya'i rgyal po kA la bad+mo'i sgo nga'i sbubasan 'dug cing/ mig ma bye ba/
[0f7c] drug gis kyang sgra skad kyi gdangs khrang cing snyan pas bya'i tshogs thams cad bral gyis gnon bar byed do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du dang po'i sams bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma/
rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug cing/ mig 'as dang/ nyon mos pa'i bun ba'i rab 'ab kyis spyis log pa dang/ dgaba'i rtsa ba yongs su sdong 'i sbyor ba bsgrub pa'i sgra skad kyis
nyan spros dang rang sangs rgyus thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed do// 'jam dang la rigs kyi bu 'amA/ rags kyi bu mo gang la la zhag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tham
cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyod kyi ra'i shAng rtas 'gro ba ltabu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhange/ lha'i gos dag kyang byan te/
de ltar sbyin pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad du byen la/ rigs kyang 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhag gis ni glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dapa' gcuge la nyanagacig
[4]/ zan gcig byanin/'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyod do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams//

thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi glang po che'i shing rtas 'grol lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i sbas ro brgya dang ldan pa byani nang/ lha'i gos dag kyang byin
te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskul pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ ras kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhag gsani zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gtsug la
'di gcig ldan gcig byin na/ 'di nadi bas ches bsod nams grangs med bskyod do// 'jam dpa 'arigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhag gis phyogs kunu'i 'jig rten gyi ma

thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi zla ba dang tu mas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byung chub sems dpa3 rnams la nyin gcig banAn du lha'i brasaro brgya dang ldan pa byane zhange/ lha'i gos dag kyang
byon te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad du gyun la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhagi gsin/ nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sogs
dpa' gtsug lanyani gcig zan gcig byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod namasagrangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhag gis phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mas cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dang ba rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du
lha'i bras ro brgya dang ldan ba byan zhing/ lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin babaskal pa gang+ga'i klung gabya masnyad du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhag gsan/
zlu[‚Äù ]de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gage la nyin gcig thun gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas res bsod nams grus mad pa bskyad do/

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de 'a7/ bdag byang chub thob pan/ sems can gang su dag rgyal bo'i 'jigs pas skrag pa dang/ gang dag bang
